Keep up with all of our events!

  • Sep19

    Grace Hopper Student Panel

    September 19th, 2017 @ 7:00pm - 8:00pm106 WVG

    Learn about the Grace Hopper Conference from fellow students who have attended in the past.

  • Sep12

    Welcome Dinner

    September 12th, 2017 @ 6:30pm - 8:00pm106 WVG

    Welcome to another semester of NUWiT! Come by to meet fellow students and CCIS faculty and for some great food!

  • Apr10

    Elections and End of Semester Potluck

    April 10th, 2017 @ 7:00pm - 8:00pm415 Shillman

    This is your chance to vote for next year's E-Board! More information will be sent out once the nominations close, but if you're interested, you still have until noon tomorrow to apply (https://goo.gl/tULpRH). We'll also be having our annual end of semester potluck, so bring a favorite food to share (don't worry if you don't have a kitchen; it doesn't have to be cooked)!

  • Apr3

    Make Your Perfect Schedule

    April 3rd, 2017 @ 7:00pm - 8:00pm415 Shillman

    Worried about scheduling? Don't know who to take a class with? Just completely lost about what is actually needed? If you answered yes to any of those questions, come to Monday's meeting to ask upperclassman what our tracks looked like, and how you can perhaps make yours better. Also come learn about some of the tools we use for making our schedules, like the mysterious degree audit, and services like courseoff and coursepro!

  • Mar20

    Technology and Terminology with Runkeeper

    March 20th, 2017 @ 7:00pm - 8:00pm415 Shillman

    Have you ever wondered what technologies are actually used in a real-world work environment? Or what all those technical sounding terms being thrown around actually mean? If you have, then this meeting is for you! Runkeeper will be here to explain more and answer any questions you might have about all that technology and terminology.
